EDIT_NAME.paragraph: Once changed, your name will also be modified in the sender application.

LOGOUT.title: Are you sure you want to log out ?
LOGOUT.paragraph: You will be redirected to the home page and will need to log in again to access the app.

DELETE_ACCOUNT.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
DELETE_ACCOUNT.paragraph_1_1: All of your data will be deleted immediatly and you will be redirected to the home page.
DELETE_ACCOUNT.paragraph_2: Your active subscription will be canceled of your data will be deleted immediatly and you will be redirected to the home page.
